s1.title: Useful java.io.FileFilters
s1.p: Avalon Excalibur's Input/Output package is in org.apache.avalon.excalibur.io. It includes a number of FileFilters that you can use for your own purposes. This fills a gap in the Java runtime because the interface was specified but no implementations were given.
